lazarus_implementation_tools.general.utils module

lazarus_implementation_tools.general.utils.get_data_from_json_map(json_data, json_map)[source]

Retrieves data from a nested JSON structure using a dot-separated path.

Parameters:

  • json_data – The nested JSON data.

  • json_map – A dot-separated string representing the path to the desired data.

Returns:

The data at the specified path, or None if the path is invalid.
